�Hugar�


   Hugar was furious, he wanted to go scout.  "What the Slag is wrong with 
you!, I want to go scout so I can get used to the land around the base. You 
can send someone with me if you think I'm out to destroy you.  I just want 
to look at the land so I can be helpful incase we get attacked.  Is that so 
wrong!!"  Hugar wanted to go scout and to get out of the base before the big 
boom.
